urlText: Lift at Mortdale Station not available between the concourse and Morts Road and Pitt Street
content:
The lift between the concourse and Morts Road and Pitt Street is temporarily out of service.
If you need an accessible route, an alternative is available by using Railway Parade, Ellen Subway and Cook Street. 
If you need help, ask staff or phone 02 9563 7585.
